name: Dim Wit
description:
Warning!!! Do not full screen!

Controls:

Mouse:

For mouse controls just click the squares (Not recommended for getting a high score)

Keyboard:

Numpad

Each number on the numpad (1-9) correspond to a square on the grid. Clicking that number is the same as clicking that square. Make sure numlock is on!

[7][8][9]

[4][5][6]

[1][2][3]

Keys

Alternatively, if you do not have a numpad you can use the keys

[q][w][e]

[a][s][d]

[z][x][c]

Compo entry for Ludum Dare 39.

Theme: Running out of Power
